Ad Wall Guide

Welcome to Ad Wall! Here's how to use it:

  • Connect Wallet: Click "Connect Wallet" to link your Sui wallet.
  • Select Area: Click and drag on the grid to move, then click to select an area. Adjust width and height.
  • Buy Blocks: Purchase your selected blocks with Test SUI.
  • Upload Ad: After buying, upload an image or GIF with an optional caption.
  • Zoom: Use the fixed slider to zoom in/out (up to 10x).
